summary: Provides classes for parsing MARC binary records, exposing the leader, directory, fields and tag lines, and offering utilities to decode binary subfields and retrieve ISBN values. Includes a helper class to manage binary data fields and their hierarchical subfield structure.
business_intent: Enable Open Library to ingest, interpret and index MARCâ€‘encoded bibliographic data, facilitating the extraction of key identifiers such as ISBNs for cataloging and search purposes.
